::: {#hero-heading style="text-align:left"}
I am a research scientist with a background in Biomedical Engineering. My primary interests include:

• [Biotechnology and Biomechanics](resources/biox/biox.qmd)

• [Data Visualization](resources/data_viz/ds_viz.qmd). See samples of my work [here](https://twitter.com/afrodataviz1) and [here](https://www.instagram.com/afrodataviz/)

In the [**blog**](blog.qmd) section, I hope to introduce readers to the basics of [data](resources/ds_ml_ai/ds_ml_ai.qmd) [analysis](resources/programming/programming.qmd) and [visualization](resources/data_viz/ds_viz.qmd) and provide a periodic summary of recent advances in [biotechnology and biomechanics](resources/biox/biox.qmd).
:::
